definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: make, do (Targum Syr. OAram. Nab. Palm. Eg. Aram. (S-C:Pap.; cf. [[אַזְדָּא]]); = BH [[עָבַד]], q.v., but in mng. ‖[[עשׂה ]]);—
make, acc. rei Da 3:1; Da 3:15 and (of creation) Je 10:11; make a feast Da 5:1, war Da 7:21 ([[עם]] pers.). ded. of temple Ezr 6:16.

do, acc. of deed, Da 4:32 (of God), Da 6:23 Ezr 4:15, Ezr 4:22; do, act, [[כְּנֵמָא]], thus, Ezr 6:13, [[כ]], according to, Da 7:18 and (of God) Da 4:32, abs. Da 6:11; acc. +[[ב]] rei Ezr 7:18 do something with, +[[עִם]] pers. Ezr 6:8; do, perform, acc. of God’s law Ezr 7:26, acc. of signs, etc. (subj. God) Da 6:28 and (+[[עִם]] pers.) 3:32.
be made into, c. n. pred., Da 2:5, Da 3:29, Ezr 6:11.
be done, wrought, Ezr 4:19, Ezr 5:8 (subj. [[עֲבִידְתָּא]]); be performed, executed, of command Ezr 6:12, Ezr 7:21, Ezr 7:23, judgment Ezr 7:26.
